Mr Johnson -
If you are a member of this group you can post photos of your
signature in the photo albums. It is otherwise difficult to say the
least, to help you given the information below...
-t

messages.messageBody:
I have several older swords. one of ionterest is a short sword with
the name amei daijo and the genration number/date (hard to determine it
is either first or seventh) any inf0 one this sword is appreciated
